before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"a52sr","text":"Note that the source and final 96-well plates will follow the same order (If the wells of a column of the source plates has empty wells the multichannel will aspirate in that well) but media will not be dispensed in those corrresponding final wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
